member.name: T:VisionDemo.MainApp
member.summary: Tha main form

member.name: M:VisionDemo.MainApp.drawMouth(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draw the mouth area of Mr Plong
member.param: X coordinate of the centre of the mouth
Y coordinate of the centre of the mouth
a parameter indicating the width of the mouth in the range 0-100
a parameter indicating how open the mouth is in the range 0-100 (0=closed, 100=wide open)
a parameter indicating smiling in the range 0-100 (0=neutral, 100=biggest smile)

member.name: M:VisionDemo.MainApp.drawEyebrow(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws an eyebrow of Mr Plong
member.param: X coordinate of the centre of the eyebrow
Y coordinate of the centre of the eyebrow
width of the eyebrow in pixels
curvature of the eyebrow in the range 0-100
true=left eyebrow, false=right eyebrow

member.name: M:VisionDemo.MainApp.drawEye(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws an eye of Mr Plong
member.param: X coordinate of the centre of the eye
Y coordinate of the centre of the eye
width of the eye in pixels
how far is he looking to the left in the range -100 to 100
how much is he looking down in the range 0-100
how far down is the eyelid in the range 0-100

member.name: M:VisionDemo.MainApp.autoSave
member.summary: Occasionally save the face classifier data. This ensures that any new faces learned are not forgotten.

member.name: T:VisionDemo.mainModule
member.summary: This module contains DLL declarations and a few other titbits

member.name: F:VisionDemo.mainModule.Declare
member.summary: This is the main update routine
member.param: An index number corresponding to the camera. Typically this is just set to zero. A camera index was included within this function to cope with a situation where stereo cameras might be used, and you may want to select which of the two cameras that you wish to use
A bitmap containing the image grabbed from the camera. Usually this is an image in the default webcam resolution of 320x240 pixels
Width of the camera image in pixels
Height of the camera image in pixels
A value returned to indicate the number of segments which were detected. This is really only for debugging purposes
